Welcome to ScrumWithMe.com

Scrum is one of many frameworks designed for developing products of the highest possible value and is a subset of the Agile Methodology which uses a series of values and principles to deliver software incrementally instead of all at once. ScrumWithMe.com was created by QA Analyst and Product Owner, Scott McLintock, with the intention of sharing all of the knowledge learnt on the journey to becoming a certified Scrum Master.
